data.title: The Cossacks: A Tale of the Caucasus in the Year 1852. UKRAINIA by Tolstoi, Count Lyof N
authors: Tolstoi, Count Lyof N. / Dole, Nathan Haskell - translator
data.meta_description: Find the best prices on The Cossacks: A Tale of the Caucasus in the Year 1852. UKRAINIA by Tolstoi, Count Lyof N at BIBLIO | Hardcover | Used - Good- | 1888 | Walter Scott  |
data.text:
The Cossacks: a tale of the Caucasus in the year 1852 by Count Lyof N. Tolstoi Used Good Hardcover Show Details Description: London: Walter Scott. Good. 168mm / 237mm. Hardcover. n.d. [1888]. 560 pages. Cover worn and small stains. Library number on spine and name on ffep oherwise no library markings
. Sevastopol and The Cossacks. A Tale of the Caucasus in the Year 1852 by Tolstoi, Count Lyof N. Used Near Fine Hardcover first Show Details Description: New York: Thomas Y. Crowell & Co., 1888. This volume contains two of Tolstoi's works: the "Authorized Edition" of "Sevastopol," (translation by isabel F. Hapgood) and the "Authorized Translation" of "The Cossacks" (translation by Nathan Haskell Dole) bound together. Uncommon. A Near Fine copy of the First American Edition. Navy blue cloth binding with gilt titling on spine and front cover. The cover has the Russian double eagle in gilt. Clean text; 262 pages and 350 pages. Decorative endpapers; there is a list of Tolstoi's works opposite the Title Page. Previous-owner label on the FPD; different previous-owner signature on reverse of the FFEP. Tiny bit of rub, small black spot on front cover; gilt on spine somewhat dulled. Really quite a nice copy. In an archival plastic protector.. First American Edition.. Hard Cover. Near Fine/No Jacket. 12mo - over 6¾" - 7¾" tall.
